alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 1:38PM CST until January 02 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Oklahoma, including the following counties, Le Flore and Pushmataha. * WHEN...Until 445 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 138 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Poteau... Heavener... Wister... Howe... Whitesboro... Muse... Talimena State Park... Lake Wister State Park... Summerfield... Honobia... Hodgen... Heavener Runestone Park... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
